# f5xc_namespace (Resource)

Manages a Namespace in F5 Distributed Cloud.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "f5xc_namespace" "example" {
  name        = "my-namespace"
  description = "Example namespace for application workloads"
  
  labels = {
    environment = "production"
    team        = "platform"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the namespace.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Description of the namespace.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels to apply to the namespace.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the namespace.
